caption.p: Linear plot of the pseudo second-order equation for copper biosorption by Ceriporia lacerata. Experimental conditions: pH 6.0, initial copper(II) concentration = 100 mg/L, volume of copper(II) solution = 100 mL, Ceriporia lacerata dose = 2 g/L, contact time = 12 h, shaking rate = 150 r/min, temperature = 25°C.
